values:
This has been a semi crazy week...I most def almost snapped this week...seriously I wanted to beat someone.  I think Jen is the only one who truly understands where I am coming from...thank god for Cross Country..it definitly gets my frustration out!!
Well...work suxs like usual....except for the new addition to the staff ;) HeHe..I called dibs!! Yes!!!  Neways....
I wish school was almost over...I am so unmotivated to do anything right now.  I can't wait until next quarter when I have no classes at all!! HaHa!! Yay for me!!!  
I've done a lot of thinking this week and I talked to Janae on the phone for almost an hour today...and Ive decided that I am happy with my life right now. I mean I have everything that I have ever wanted.  I have a best friend who is there for me through thick and thin. Without her I think I would go crazy...I mean I know we haven't beem as close lately as I wish we were but that's cuz we are both busy with work and such...But I just know that she is always there for me and I love her to death for it!! Seriously....Kelly is my knight in shining armor!!  I am also super close to my mom at the moment.  For the first time in my life I always go to her with my problems and when I need to break down I go to her instead of holding it all in. I like it a lot. Yeah...But to say the least I am happy at the moment.
But Ken is still GAY!! I hate him so much...I wish he would die...I mean seriously..my mom could do so much better...he treats her like shit. And lately I don't even try anymore.  I am total bitch to him...and I enjoy every minute of it!! Yes!! I look forward to the weekends just so I can see how many times I can piss him off...Its great!!!
Newayz...Im gonna go to bed!!!
Luv!!!
GOD YOU FAT PIECE OF LARD!!! HAHA I Luv Rans!!!

You have no idea how much you have hurt me...
You have no idea how many tears you have made me cry...
I wish I could just yell at you and tell you how I really feel, instead of just smiling and keeping my mouth shut.
I know you dont care..but then again I don't blame you.
I wish I could just erase you from my mind...instead of being reminded of you everyday.
Ive tried to erase you...but it doesn't work
I wish it was the day when I could be able to say good-bye and never see you again....
I hate you for what you've done to me
I hate you
I wish I could just leave.....
But instead you are ban from my life...for ever
I think I am gonna snap....

Ok..This is gonna be super super long...but I haven't written in this thing forever and I really don't have anything else to do right now.
Homecoming week has been the best ever!! I had soo much fun!!!
**Monday**
Monday wasn't such a good day.  I stayed home sick and slept all day which was nice.  I have been on the go since school started and I don't think I have ever gotten to sleep in..it suxs...and I got sick so my mom decided that I sounded like a I was dying and she told me to go back to bed!! It was great.  But I still went to practice because I wanted to run in the meet. And I had to work which kinda suxed.  Everyone has left Culver's...I really really need to get out of there!! Its getting serious!! HaHa
**Tuesday**
We had our home cross country meet. It was pretty good.  I kinda got stuck in a bad position because I lost contact with the group in front of me and I didn't ever catch up to them.  I mean I think I did pretty good, I was just hoping for a faster time. My dad, Janae, and Kennedy all came. That was exciting.  We went out to eat afterwards and that was a ton of fun!! Kennedy is so much fun..I love her to death!!!  Then I went out TPing..OMG..Greatest ever. All the XC seniors got together to tp people we don't like on the team.  We got a couple houses and then we got Kelsey.  I tricked her into believing that I wanted to go out tping with her but when I got there to meet up with her there were like 10 of us!!  We covered her in Ketchup, Mustard, Mayo, Syrup, and this NASTY cheese stuff that Dale found in the back of his fridge!! And then Harris nailed her with an egg from like 3 feet away!!  Yeah and then we were driving and we saw someone in all black so we chased him and then Dale and Pete tackled him.  Yeah poor kid..they covered him in syrup and stole all of his stuff!!
**Wednesday**
I had to work so I didn't get to go out..I was semi-pissed...but I still didn't feel good so I wanted to go to bed.  I am pretty sure I had a mental breakdown when I got home though.  At work JK talked to me for almost half an hour about things going on in her life.  She was crying and the whole nine yards...I felt super bad because I didn't really know what to say but I think it was one of those times when she just wanted to get everything out and she just needed someone to listen.  But it got me thinking about things in my life.  And I came home and bawled in my mom's room for almost an hour.  It was so bad.  I guess I felt better after...but still....I just wish I had answers to some things...but I doubt I will ever get them, and I am just going to give up.  I can't keep trying for things that are going no where.
**Thursday**
Another AWESOME nite.  Powder Puff was kick ass!! My team won 56-14!!  It was sooo much fun!!  I got some tackles...well I guess we didn't really tackle...but ya know...then it was out for some more fun.  All the seniors went to Mal's house and ate a pre-tp dinner.  Then we had a HUGE senior train.  There were almost 20 cars.  We got a bunch of people but then we had to split up cuz the police were following us.  But i went an got Chelsea. It was the best ever.  We crammed 6 people in my car and went out to the middle of no where. HaHa..Gotta love her farm!! When we got there her dog was freaking out..so we were all trying to be quiet so it wouldn't see us or anything.  We first tped one house on the side where we couldn't be seen.  But then we befriended the dog and played fetch with it..so it stopped barking!!  We got her house super good. Her porch was saran wrapped together, we tped her quite well and she got some condiments on her porch and grass. But the best part was our industrial strength packing tape. It was prolly a foot in width and we taped all her trees together...haha best ever.  But wait..there is more.  She has goats....so we spray painted 05 on them..and me being the brave one...I did it!! HaHa!! But at least she isn't mad!!
**Friday**
It was soo rainy and cold today.  I went tailgating at 5 and it rained and I froze my ass off!! It was worth every minute of it...but I thought I was gonna die!!  My lips were turning purple..which I most def don't think is a good thing!!! HaHa!! We won homecoming though!! It was sooo exciting since we haven't won in soo long!!!  I love football games!!!  
But yeah..that's about it..Or at least all im gonna write.  I am still cold and I am gonna go to bed!! 
Dance is tomorrow and I can't wait!!!
Luv Always!!!

So Saturday was WAY bad...haha...I wanted to go home and go to bed, but NO...Jean forced me to go party.  And that was a way bad idea.  I almost died that nite!!  I don't think i should ever drink again..haha..like that will happen.  
Last nite at work everyone was giving me tons of lectures!!  Jen was mad cuz she said I coulda got alcohol poisoning.  And she was telling me how stupid I was.  And then Dustin was talking about how I scared him so much because I definitly passed out in the bathroom in front of the door so no one could get in.  And then i guess he finally got in and i wouldn't move and he couldn't wake me up.  I remember being able to hear him but no being able to respond or move.  Yeah I am pretty sure they got me awake and then i just passed out again.  Hmm....good times..right?
Newayz Xc was great tonite.  Everyone was talking about how the course was really bad, but honestly i didn't think it was hard at all.  I got 10th!!  I was excited!! 
I went to Central over the weekend and OMG..I love it there.  I want to go there for college sooo bad!!  I dont know what it was but I just loved it there!!   
But newayz...I have a 1500 word essay to write!! YAY!!
Luv!!!
Oo..and I am now engaged to Dierks Bentley..me and Jean are gonna have joint weddings for me and dierks and her and kenny!! HaHa!!

Yeah so I have definitly hit the max for my stress level.  It suxs...Monday-Wednesday I go to school, cross-country, and then I have to close at work!! Yeah and when I get home at almost 11 I have to do homework.  YaY!! Then Thursdays I have cross country meets which totally zap all my energy.  Then Fridays I have practice and go straight to the FB Game. Saturdays I have practice at 8 am and then I work and Sundays I work all day.  Hmmm...no time for Brit.  Last weekend I didn't have a weekend. I got home at 12:00 on Friday after the football game, then I had to wake up at 5 am for an xc meet.  I got home and changed and went straight to work and had to close.  Then I definitly got home at 1230.  Then Sunday i worked 1130-8.  Last nite I most def went to bed as soon as i got home from work, which was like 9.  
Yeah so I came home last wednesday bawling to my mom.  I was FREAKING OUT!! Work, Cross-country, and school are all seperatly stressing me out and then my dad has been being gay.  I just don't need anything else going on right now!!!  But now i have hit the point where I don't care anymore.  I am just gonna ignore everything and have fun!!
Tonite at work me, jen, and sara were all there.  OMG..worst thing to do ever.  We were talking all nite.  And at one point we were laughing so hard we were crying and I am pretty sure I was on the floor laughing.  Jen was humping me and i fell and then we just couldnt'stop laughing!! I am so tired that everything is funny to me!! Its great!!!  At least tonite was good at work because I definitly have my two weeks written and Im just waiting for another bad day because then I am gonna turn it in!!
Newayz...I'm gonna go to bed now...
Luv!!!!

Yeah so I have definitly hit the max for my stress level.  It suxs...Monday-Wednesday I go to school, cross-country, and then I have to close at work!! Yeah and when I get home at almost 11 I have to do homework.  YaY!! Then Thursdays I have cross country meets which totally zap all my energy.  Then Fridays I have practice and go straight to the FB Game. Saturdays I have practice at 8 am and then I work and Sundays I work all day.  Hmmm...no time for Brit.  Last weekend I didn't have a weekend. I got home at 12:00 on Friday after the football game, then I had to wake up at 5 am for an xc meet.  I got home and changed and went straight to work and had to close.  Then I definitly got home at 1230.  Then Sunday i worked 1130-8.  Last nite I most def went to bed as soon as i got home from work, which was like 9.  
Yeah so I came home last wednesday bawling to my mom.  I was FREAKING OUT!! Work, Cross-country, and school are all seperatly stressing me out and then my dad has been being gay.  I just don't need anything else going on right now!!!  But now i have hit the point where I don't care anymore.  I am just gonna ignore everything and have fun!!
Tonite at work me, jen, and sara were all there.  OMG..worst thing to do ever.  We were talking all nite.  And at one point we were laughing so hard we were crying and I am pretty sure I was on the floor laughing.  Jen was humping me and i fell and then we just couldnt'stop laughing!! I am so tired that everything is funny to me!! Its great!!!  At least tonite was good at work because I definitly have my two weeks written and Im just waiting for another bad day because then I am gonna turn it in!!
Newayz...I'm gonna go to bed now...
Luv!!!!

Yeah so me and Jen K had one of our life talks tonite. They are rather depressing....oo well...we just talk about true things.  Yeah I feel really bad for her because of things with Bob.  I realized that things in her life and things in my life are really really similar.  I like our talks....i can really trust her...and I don't really trust a lot of people.  I like it...
But yeah...Tonite is one of those nites that is just not good....it suxs!!  
Whatever I think I should just go to bed before my headache goes from bad to super bad from worrying about things....

Jen said it the best....I wish I had my old life back

Yeah...so I had three days off of work and they were the best ever.  I had to close tonite and I seriously thought I was going to have to shoot myself!! It was way way bad.  I was really tired too for some reason. I don't even know why cuz I slept in.  Maybe it was the fact that I had a huge headache all last nite and it was still there when I woke up!!  Oo well..Neways...Work...yeah..So me and Dusty had a food fight for like 2 hours!!  Yeah he hit me in the face with a cod and then I threw a hot dog at him and it hit him in the face...it was HILARIOUS!!! Yeah we just kept throwing food at each other all nite.  He nailed me with a steak and it exploded on my back..so I most def have a huge blood stain on my nice white shirt. Oo well..I got him back.  At least he didn't spray water on me cuz he did that one other time and it was way bad since my shirt is way way thin!!!  
Yeah....So xc had officially started since we had our first meet on Thursday..I've decided I really need to start working my ass off at practice!!  I want to go to state so bad and I am not where I need to be.  But I will definitly start workin on that.  We run at Noel Ridge on Thursday..I am way excited because I LOVE that course!!!  
Yesterday I had to babysit all day!! It was crazy!! I have decided I don't want kids!! HaHa!! Seriously this kid is like 1 1/2 and he can't say anything so he just screamed all day, it was extremly frustrating!!  I told Nick that I wasn't going to have any kids and he said that he was gonna get me pregnant and then make me move back to Iowa from Cali..HaHa...RIIIGHT!!
Me and Nick hung out last nite.  Yeah......I don't even know what to say about that..We watched The Secret Window...It was a good movie!!  But yeah..I don't know what to think anymore!! 
Yeah...So Im gonna go to bed...I'll write more lata!!
Luv!!!!

I fall to pieces
Each time I see you again
I fall to pieces
How can I be just your friend

You want me to act like we've never kissed
You want me to forget
Pretend we've never met
And I've tried, and I've tried, but I haven't yet
You walk by and I fall to pieces

I fall to pieces
Each time someone speaks your name
I fall to pieces
Time only adds  to the flame 

You want me to find someone else to love
Someone who'll love me too
The way you used to do.
But each time I go out with someone new
You walk by and I fall to pieces
You walk by and I fall to pieces

So I haven't wrote in forever...and there is tons to write...but i guess I am thinking I won't even come close to covering everything...but shit happens.
So school suxs...I hate government like no other...its boring and I don't get it.  So I am always frustrated.  Speaking of frustrated...I am way frustrated about things.  I just don't know what is going on in one aspect of my life.  And it just confuses the hell out of me.  All I can say is mixed signals are the worst when you still have strong feelings.  I don't know what to do anymore...all I can say is it is hard for me everyday.  But things are truly getting better.  
So Kelly is my lover!! She is the greatest thing that has ever happened to me...i swear without her I would die!!  She is so great to talk to and she makes everything all better for me!! I love it.  She is was easy to talk to and she is the best friend i have ever had.  And FYI...Kel is better than everyone....so fuck off!!! HaHa..Sorry....
Yeah so the other nite i was told that I use my friends..hmm...that was a great way to end a GREAT day (note the sarcasim) I swear I had a mental break down that nite.  I watched a movie until 12 and then something inside me snapped and i just started bawling.  And I couldn't stop. A lot of things had built up...I just wish I would have had someone there to hold me in their arms because that would have made me feel soo much better!!  But that didn't happen...so i just sat with my teddy and cried...and then i wrote a book in my journal just to get things out of my brain because they were making it start to hurt.  But yeah...
I hate ken..if anyone didn't know that.  I seriously wish he would die.  The last two weekend have been the worst ones ever.  I think he is the one who sent me over the edge on Sunday. He is an asshole and I don't know how much more I can take...honestly I hate him more than anything in the world.  He has hurt me so much and I can never ever forgive him for what he has done to me...even though he thinks we should be friends...haha...he can go fuck himself.  
Newayz...I gotta race tomorrow so I better go to bed!!
Luv!!!

Yeah...So school started yesterday...that's craziness.  But I am kinda glad to be back.  I didn't really hang out with many people from school this summer..even though me and Kel decided we didn't really want to hang out with other people... so it was good to see everyone again.  But Yeah...I was super mad cuz I had an ass load of homework and it was only the first day of school..but you know..it happens.  My schedule is great though cuz I am with Kel for half of my day!!  Its exciting.
Cross country was WAY WAY hot yesterday.  I was suppose to run 8 but I could only run 7..I got super dizzy and I had to take a break..hehe...I didn't want to fall over and die.  
I had to work last nite...that was ok..we were slow so it was mostly talk time.  I closed with Kel and Jen squared.  Yeah...good times at Culver's.
When I got home from work last nite I had the greatest convo with one of my California hotties..hehe....Yeah....about that.  Hmm....the beach sounds good.  LoL!!!  Newayz...He made me laugh!!!!
Yeah so I better go get ready for school..I Love having first block off!! 
Luv!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

RuNnErGuRl493: i guess im not that exciting
LitBlueShoes: come on
LitBlueShoes: i got a hott girl in canada talkin to me
LitBlueShoes: now how is that not exciting
RuNnErGuRl493: except one thing
RuNnErGuRl493: im not in canada
RuNnErGuRl493: lol
LitBlueShoes: o yeah
LitBlueShoes: but i like canadians
LitBlueShoes: so dont worry
HaHaHaHa!!!!

I swear to god this was one of the worst weekends ever.  Well I guess you could include all last week in that too.  I dunno...Nothin is going right and I am way stressed out about everything.  I hate ken with a passion and I wish he would die...but what's new about that.  
I'm way sad summer was over.  I kinda have mixed feelings about my summer. In some ways it was the best summer and in some ways it was the worst.  But whatever.. I wish somethings would have been different about my summer and I have a lot of regrets about it too.. But oo well its not like I can go back in time and change things.  
It seems like me and kel became super close this summer.  I guess that's what happens when you really need someone.  She was the only thing that kept me going for awhile this summer....I think I would have totally shut down and been just a blob of B. Whitsell if she hadn't been there.  I love her to death...what else can I say.  I can't wait until we get our apartment, its gonna be way fun!!!
Yeah...I don't really have a whole lot else to say...So I guess I'm Outie.
All I have left to say is...Fuck Life, I quit

I hate ken more than anything in the whole entire world.  Seriously there is no one else that I could hate as much as I hate him.  I don't know what the hell his problem is but he is a huge asshole.  I can't wait until I am 18 because then I don't have to deal with him anymore.  No one understands what he has put me through....only I do.  I hate his yelling, I hate his attitude, I hate the way he treats me and everyone else, I just hate him.  But Im not going to dwell on it because it just makes me hate him more and makes me not be able to be happy.  
Tonite I babysat for Kendall and Avery.  It was pretty fun...I mean as fun as babysitting can be.  We played outside and mostly just watched movies.  They were once again both sick, but I am use to it now because they seem to always be sick when I am there.  But at least they both went to bed without a lot of problems.  Kendall ended up waking up cuz she didn't feel good so she just slept in my arms downstairs...we were watching GAC...I gotta get her to like country..hehe...When Katie and Tyler came home it was really uncomfortable.  Tyler was drunk and he was just being weird.  I just wanted to get out of there.  I was leaving and I honestly didn't think they were gonna pay me...but then Tyler remembered that he was holding a check in his hand..yeah..way weird....
But then I got to come home to Ken...YaY..........
I can tell this is a start of yet another fun weekend. There haven't been any really bad ones lately, but I think this is going to be one of them and with everything that is going on with me right now I don't know if I can handle it...I might just get pushed over the edge...which is just what I need.
Newayz...Practice is early...
Good Nite

I don't even know what to do anymore.  I seriously want to just want to say fuck everything and not care anymore.  Life would be easier if I just didn't care.  But that's not how it works in my world.  I am still pissed off about work..I talked to Sara she is pissed too.  Yeah we are all wanting to quit.  I seriously thought Rich and Carol were better people than they are.  But obviously I don't know them like I thought I did.  
Yesterday I swear I was on the verge of having a mental break down.  After I left worked I started crying and I just couldn't stop.  I called my mom but I couldn't even talk to her.  She really doesn't understand I don't think.  I don't think anyone really does.  I tried to call nick but he was at work...I think out of anyone he is the easiest to talk to...even though I feel like I am just complaining.  I always love talking to him cuz he makes things better....but I hate venting to him too cuz I feel bad...I just don't want to seem like I am always bitching about something.  
I hate life right now.....
But Kel made last nite a blast.  We had way too much fun.  I swear I have never stolen so much stuff in one nite!!  We drove around doin that...then we met up with some people and that was fun......HaHa....Yeah Kel.....Newayz......I'm boring...
Me and Jean were suppose to go to the rodeo tonite...but that didn't work out so good.  I think Im gonna go to a movie tonite with her though!! YaY!!!
Newayz...I'm tired...Yeah..me and Kel got home at 2 and I don't remember when we went to bed..but we most def got up at 945 so she could go to work!!

I am seriously stressed to the max right now.  I hate everything.  I swear I wish I could just go to sleep and not wake up for a long time.
Today at work we had this gay ass meeting and it just pissed me off more than ever.  Julie is such a bitch.  I got up and left.  And then I called my mom crying..but I only talked to her for like 3 seconds cuz I was so pissed I didn't even want to talk.  I hate work and its about to get way gay.  Last nite Jean walked out of work and she wasn't going to come to the meeting today but Carol convinced her to.  We made a plan that if things got bad we were just going to get up and leave.  If Rich and Carol weren't there I think it would have been a lot worse because Julie would have yelled at us hardcore!! But whatever...This meeting has made me want to put my two weeks in more than anything.  I really need to find a new job first though.
Yeah...So last nite was quite gay....Me and Kel had to use the old well we have to be home line...that always shows that it is a bad nite. HaHa!! Oo well...Tonite is gonna kick ass...I can't wait.  Pizza and Movies and M&M's...even though I need them more than Kel..HaHa!!  
Errr..I don't even know what else to say..but I will wrie more later......
I can't wait to run because I need to get some of my rage out!!!!!

Yeah so I am way tired cuz I didn't go to sleep until like 2 last nite. Damn movies.  HaHa...It was kinda nice to just stay at home for once.  I rented some movies and iced my legs and knee.  HaHa..Im hurting and its only the begining of the season, that's not good.  Oo well....
Me and Nick talked last nite.  I am pretty happy about how things worked out.  I just hope that we truly stay friends and it doesn't just last a week and then we never talk anymore.  I don't think I could go without talking to him.  He is prolly the only person I truly open up to about things, but that's cuz I know I can trust him and I don't really have that with anyone else.  Even though we are just gonna be bestest friends I will still always have a special place for him in my heart and I will love him forever...I don't see how I couldn't.  
Yeah so cross country has been way fun this week...haha...I just want meets to start.  They are the most fun.  But we still have a few weeks for that.  I just gotta keep working my ass off at practice. I want so bad to go to state.  I think that is probably the most important thing to me this year.  And this year I am not gonna do anything stupid like last year to mess it up.  Last year was bad and I'm not going back to that....ever....
I can't wait for tomorrow nite!! Me and Kel are having a sleepover!! YaY for powerpuff girls!! HaHa!! We are such dorks..Yesterday Kel told me I was grounded and I had to come to her room...naked...HaHa....We have way too much fun together.  I Luv Kel!!!!
Newayz....I need to get ready for XC poster pics......Later......
Luv!!!
FYI...I am Kinda Sorta Starting to DESTRESS...But Its not goin all that well

Middle of the night
Takin' your heart
And holdin' it tight

Emotional touch
Touchin' my skin
And askin' you to do
What you've been doin' all over again

Oh, it's a beautiful thing
Don't think I can keep it all in
I just gotta let you know
What it is that won't let me go

It's your love
It just does somethin' to me
It sends a shock right through me
I can't get enough
And if you wonder
About the spell I'm under
It's your love

Better than I was
More than I am
And all of this happened
By takin' your hand

And who I am now
Is who I wanted to be
And now that we're together
I'm stronger than ever
I'm happy and free

Oh, it's a beautiful thing
Don't think I can keep it all in, no
And if you asked me why I changed
All I gotta do is say your sweet name

It's your love
It just does somethin' to me
It sends a shock right through me
I can't get enough
And if you wonder
About the spell I'm under
It's your love

Oh, it's a beautiful thing

It sends a shock right through me
I can't get enough

It's your love

Yeah so I swear the weekend was one of the worst weekends of my life!!
Friday nite I had to close at work.  Closing wasn't too bad I guess.  We were all just complete idiots all nite.  Jp closed so I basically did nothing.  I changed it so that Kelly would be with me in the kitchen instead of Nate too.  It was Nate's last day cuz he's going to Iraq.  I was being super mean cuz hes kinda dumb and when you tell him to do something he just stares at you with his mouth hanging open..no joke.  But I asked people if it made them feel safe to know that he would be the person fighting for our country.  Everyone just laughed..oo well...I'm a bitch...what can I say.  
Saturday I went to the team run in the morning.  I ran 10 miles!!!!  I was way proud of myself!! I ran with Clark and Fetzer too!!  Coach said that he is going to have me do interval work this week while everyone else is getting back into shape!! Hopefully that will mean that I can be super good this year. I am really excited for cross country to start.  It is something that I am actually good at.  And I like that it isn't really a team sport. But yeah...I worked 11:30-5 and that was fun.  Me and Ralphie changed the position chart a bunch so that we liked it!! HeHe!! It was funny.  But Julie wasn't there so ya know...We were really slow Saturday.  Me and Dani were in teh kitchen and we just went to the back and got our buckets and we just sat all day unless food came up!! It was awesome.  But yeah.  Saturday nite was fun. 
Sunday I got to close once again.  I swear it was one of the worst days I have ever had at work.  Everyone was pissing me off...well more like a couple people.  But I was most def freaking out.  Everyone was yelling at everyone. It was terrible.  But shit happens.  Me and Dani were yelling at each other but we were mostly joking...especially cuz we were talking like sid the sloth!! HeHe!! But yeah...It was weird Sara, Ralphie and Me all worked the exact same hours Friday, Saturday, and Sunday!! CRAZINESS!!! But newayz..Last nite when I came home I was in such a bad mood and I was super frustrated and stressed about everything.  I talked to my mom for a lil bit and then I took a shower and then I went in my room and cried.  It was sad...but I am seriously frustrated with EVERYTHING in my life.  Nothing is going right right now.  I got to talk to Kel about things for a lil bit at work but it seems like everytime I went to the kitchen to talk to her a customer came and I had to go back up front.  Oo well though. 
Yeah so Josh won't stop calling me.  It is really starting to piss me off like no other!! He calls me like 5 times a day!!  I haven't answered for 4 days and he doesn't get the point!! I swear I am going to go crazy if he keeps calling me!!! Oo well...Newayz....Better get ready to go to FUN FUN work!! HaHa!!!
Luv!!!

The past couple days have been the hardest days of my life.  Nick broke up with me on Thursday and I have been a mess since then.  The hardest part is that I don't know why and the fact that he won't talk to me.  I swear to god I am falling apart.  I haven't eaten since Wednesday when we went out to lunch for my birthday.  My mom came into Culver's last nite when I was on my break to try to get me to eat and food just makes me sick.  I just don't know what to do.  EVerytime I think I have a handle on myself something happens to make me think of him and I burst into tears.  Its a miracle I didn't have a complete break down at work.  Last nite when I came home from work me and my mom watched a movie and I ended up sleeping in her room...it was kind of sad. But I dunno.  I just can't take it anymore.  I lost my best friend and I don't even know why.  All I want to do is talk to him.  I know exactly what I want to say and it will take all of 5 minutes...but I guess I am no longer important enough for that.  Tuesday is going to be the worst day ever...that would have been our one year anniversary.  Since I took the day off of work..I will prolly sit in my room and cry all day.  I will never be able to get over Nick..no matter what.  I can't even imagine myself with another guy.  
LIFE SUXS!!!!
I wish someone would just shoot me.....

Ok...So all last nite and for the past few hours I have been preparing myself to do the most important thing that I will have to do.  I am SUPER scared and nervous.  I don't want to lose my best friend and the only person I truely trust.  I have down what I am going to say and I guess all I can do is hope that it works.  Last nite I was a mess.  I went into Culver's cuz I wanted to see Kelly, and I just started crying there.  Holz came out and said some really nice things to me and said she loved me...it was sweet.  Then I talked to my dad for like an hour.  He is really the person who calmed me down.  He said I should go to the wedding with him this weekend and get drunk to help with my probs.  I tried to talk to Carol cuz I wanted to go..I mean me and my dad had it all planned out.  But I would feel soo guilty because it's Culver's birthday on Saturday and EVERYONE is working. So it will be ok.  Last nite Kel helped me out soo much.  I wouldn't have a clue what I was going to do today if I hadn't talked to her.  I mean she got me on the right path and then I figured out what needs to be done.  I am so nervous and scared.  I haven't eaten anything since lunch on Wednesday...with Nick...Its bad.  But I can't eat...I just can't find anything that sounds good to me.  I went running yesterday and like 3:30 and since I hadn't eaten I died. I for real thought I was going to pass out.  And now I just shaking a lot.  I mean I can't go without eating for more than a few hours...I have had bad experiences with that in the past.....but I just can't get myself to eat.  Maybe after I talk to Nick then things will be better and I can finally get on with things. But newayz...its almost time...So I need to do some calming.
Luv!!!

love you so much, every single thing about you. 
in my eyes no one will ever be as perfect as you.
the laugh, the kiss, the touch, the voice, the eyes and the soul.
for you i've cried a thousand tears, and they've never lessened the pain.

someday you'll cry for me,
like I cried for you.
someday you'll need me,
the way I needed you.
someday you'll miss me,
like I missed you.
someday you'll love me, 
but I won't love you.

I am trusting you with my heart,
And you better not break it,
Because once you do you will never be able
 to put it back together

So I have been in Florida for a week...so this is gonna be super long since I have a lot of catching up to do.  Me and Nick drove to my dad's house on Friday..it was fun.  Then we picked up Kagers from school...and of course the real fun started. HAHA..NOT!!!  She is super annoying.  I feel really bad saying that since she is my sister and all but I think its the only child factor goin on.  But whatever.  Florida was so much fun.  Fourth of July was the best.  I think I was the happiest girl in the whole entire world that nite.  I got to watch the fireworks in Nick's arms.  I know it may sound cheesy..but after everything...it was just the best feeling in the world.  I love him so much and I swear I fell in love with him all over again that nite.  The first few days we were in Florida were kinda boring.  I mean we went to the beach and stuff but we really didn't do anything.  Wednesday Sal and Leon (Janae'e aunt and uncle) came and had lunch with us.  It was fun.  Then Thursday Nick and I went Parasailing.  I love parasailing because you are floating above the water and its really pretty and just really quiet.  We were on the boat with these two drunk girls and OMG they were ANNOYING!!  They wouldn't stop talking and it was about WAY annoying stuff.  As soon as they were up in the air the guys driving the boat started talking some MAD shit about them.  I just laughed.  Friday everyone but Janae went Jetskiing.  It was fun.  Kennedy had a BLAST!! She was really scared when we were driving over there but once she got on the jetski she just wanted to go faster.  She also learned a GREAT trick....she now knows how to flip people off. The funny thing is that she doesn't know how to do it with her finger sticking up so she just points it out straight..WAY WAY funny...but not a good thing for a 4 year old to know how to do.  But Florida was WAY WAY fun.  Me and Nick decided we are going to move down there and rent jet skis and chairs and sell hats.. It will be fun!!
Luv!!

Ok...So yesterday was one of the worst days of my entire life.  But in a way I am semi glad it happened.  I almost lost my best friend and the most important person in my life.  I'm still not sure what was wrong exactly but I have some what of an idea.  I regret so many things that I have done over the past few days.  If I could go back in time I would, without even thinking twice.  Yesterday I couldn't do anything.  It felt like I cried all day, and when I wasn't crying, I was just a blob of Brittany.  On my way to work I had calmed myself down but as soon as I walked into work I lost it.  I mean I wasn't bawling or anything like that...I just shed a few tears...I just sat in the office for a few minutes and then got to work.  Work was good for me so that I could keep my mind off of what was really going on.  Last nite when I called Nick, it was super hard. I was trying to sound happy and as if nothing was wrong, even though it wasn't true at all.  But I made it through the conversation, and it was a really good one.  Today was a good day though.  Nick went with me to Running Wild to get my new running shoes..YAY...and things were a million times better.  When he was getting out of my car and he told me he loved me, that made my day.  I went home with a huge grin on my face.  I fell in love with him all over again....The thought of losing him scares me to death....That was the hardest part about yesterday....no matter what I did I couldn't make things better and it wasn't like I could force him to not be mad.  But I am soo glad things are better now.  I went to work today to get my check...it was soo funny there were about 10 employees there.  We were having a partay...haha..Stacey was a little mad about it.  But I think she was only joking.  I talked to Kelly for a long time in the parking lot.  I luv that girl to death. She is my best friend.  I don't know what I would do without her, she always has the best advice!!!! 
Newayz...This is super long!!
LUV ALWAYS!!!
